column1: With wry humour and a strong desire to expose the TRUTH @HighImpactFlix rumbles the fake stats of #COVID19 #coronavirus #Lockdown https://youtu.be/9QV8ekh2F18

#Goodmorningto everyone who has a family member that thought they could cure #coronavirus with some lemon, ginger, garlic and onion. Let's go ask them why the CDC didn't recruit them on the spot.
